BAMTech (previously MLB Advanced Media) | New York City(NYC) | Ruby Automation Engineer | Remote OK | Full Time|

BAMTech is looking for a Ruby Automation Engineer to join our Apple & Android Platforms' Core Engineering team. This is an opportunity to help build tooling around industry leading apps while getting to work closely with some of the greatest minds in the app development world. If working in a collaborative team environment and facing new challenges every day while your apps get used by millions of people excites you, then this is the role for you. Feel free to contact me directly through the details in my profile regarding any questions.

If interested, please apply at https://boards.greenhouse.io/majorleaguebaseballadvancedmedi...
